title: Step 1 Output: View Synthesis Result
description: Defines the structure for the output of the multi-view image generation step. It includes a list of generated images and their corresponding camera poses.

images.description: An array of file paths to the generated view images.

items.description: Relative path to a PNG image file.

camera_poses.description: An array of camera poses for each corresponding image. Each pose is a 4x4 transformation matrix (row-major order).
